alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Otter Tail; Hubbard; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 01 at 3:03AM CDT until May 01 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a Red Flag Warning for low relative humidity and gusty winds, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Northwest Minnesota. * TIMING...This afternoon and evening, from noon to 8pm. * WINDS...North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the 50s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and become difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Otter Tail; Hubbard; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater; Wadena
